item.title: Moving forward to HUGO
item.description: So I finally made up my mind to spent a weekend setting up my blog with Hugo. Well I been wanting to do this for a long time but honestly I am terrible at writing stuffs since school days. And to be fair I don’t really have that much of stuffs that worth sharing. However, things are changing. As my knowledge on game developing grow I feel increasingly need to actually writing down the key points in game development.

item.title: About
item.description: I love playing video games and making stuffs that looks beautiful. I started this blog mainly to keep track of my journey through game development. And I hope the informations on this site can help you in some ways.
